history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER Transit please.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER the waterfront
TTS Okay, going to the waterfront. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER Hello.
TTS When do you want to travel
USER tomorrow
TTS Okay, travelling at 01:30 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER No.
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 40 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Forbes avenue opposite Bellefield avenue NS.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 2:10pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 61D <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Target Dr at Target Perimeter Rd.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 3:08pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 2 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 149 West Bridge St, Homestead, PA 15120, USA. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER Yes.
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No, thank you.

TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
